Package tw.jruletest.virtualmachine

Class JavaClassLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.ClassLoader
      • tw.jruletest.virtualmachine.JavaClassLoader
  • public class JavaClassLoader
extends java.lang.ClassLoader
    JavaClassLoader extends the built-in ClassLoader class.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      JavaClassLoader​(java.lang.ClassLoader parent)
      Constructor extends ClassLoader using a parent loader as argument.

        public static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> loadClasses​(java.util.List<java.io.File> classes)
                                                         throws CompilationFailureException
        Loads the classes from the provided files and gets the names of all successfully loaded classes
        Parameters:
        classes - list of files with classes to load
        Returns:
        a list of the names of all the successfully loaded classes
        Throws:
        CompilationFailureException - thrown if the files did not compile

      • loadClasses

        public static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> loadClasses​(java.util.List<java.io.File> sourceClasses,
                                                                java.util.List<java.io.File> testClasses)
                                                         throws CompilationFailureException
        Loads the classes from both lists of provided files and gets the names of all successfully loaded classes
        Parameters:
        sourceClasses - list of source files with classes to load
        testClasses - list of test files with classes to load
        Returns:
        a list of the names of all the successfully loaded classes
        Throws:
        CompilationFailureException - thrown if the files did not compile
